name: I'm bored so let's sacrifice
description:
You're bored, so you decide to make some sacrifices for the glory of no one else but the devil itself.

The but is simple
Make as much sacrifices as possible before the timer runs out or else... you'll be the sacrified one.

Simple controls
WASD or arrow keys to move

Left mouse button to select your victim (if in range)

Shift to run

I hope you enjoy it and have fun !
